products.title: Amor Pastel Yellow Vertical Blind
products.description: As soft as a yellow can be before it starts drifting into beige territory, this gorgeously chill tone relies on its washed out colour to add a certain flexibility that yellows tend to lack. Perfect for adding a gentle coloured accent to rooms with a more solid colour scheme, it mixes well with browns, blues or greys to soften the tone of the room. In direct sunlight, the yellow within the mellow will come to the fore, giving it a new lease of life and adding a startling energy to the space it occupies.
